casebody.data:
Brenda FENNELL, Administratrix of the Estate of Claude McKinley Fennell, Plaintiff,
v.
EAST CAROLINA HEALTH d/b/a Vidant Roanoke-Chowan Hospital, Darla K. Liles, M.D., and Vidant Medical Center, Defendants. No. COA18-1096 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: June 18, 2019

AFFIRMED IN PART. NO ERROR IN PART.
